info.name: TuBuddy - API Documentation
info.description:
This is the API for the _Tuberculosis Treatment Application: **TuBuddy**_. The main task of the API is to provide an easy and secure way to access the database.

This is mainly meant for the Android and iOS apps, therefore it does not include all availible requests.

# General Information
Variables which need to be filled in by the user are specified by double curly braces: `{{variable}}`

More information on how to run the api can be found at out [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/RUGSoftEng/2018-Tuberculosis-WebApp)

# Location
If you are using Vagrant, the ip location can change every time you restart the API or restart the birtualbox. This address can be seen when you run the api, or with the `get_ip` command in the virtualbox.

# Error Codes
Currently the error codes given by the API response are not very descriptive (usually just *500 Internal Server Error*). We will try to add better error codes in the future.

# Feedback
This is a work in progress documentation. Therefore, please notify us when there are any problems, inconsistencies or errors with the documentation. Other feedback is also always welcome! 
It is possible to contact us on Slack, or make a new [issue](https://github.com/RUGSoftEng/2018-Tuberculosis-WebApp/issues/new) (preferably an issue for problems, otherwise there is a chance we will forget :p).
